trends: There have been 31 other sightings in Clearwater
There were no other sightings in Clearwater on or around November 9th 2006
Summary: Large, bright, strangely silent object flashed across part of sky from north to south
divs: Sighting DetailsI was leaving the address of 403 Jasmine Way, Clearwater, 33756, a minute after midnight, walking south a short distance to the driveway. I am nearsighted and I did not have my glasses on, so I could not see detail at that distance, nor could I tell the distance in the dark. Peripherally I noticed a large, bright moving object almost directly overhead and looked up. It was traveling directly south (or perhaps falling in front of me) at a speed that would be very fast if distant or falling, glider speed if it were only skimming the three-story-tall trees I was near. I only observed it for a couple of seconds traveling in a straight line before it was obscured by the tree foliage. I was in a small clearing. There was no noise. My first thought was, "Could that have been a shooting star." My second thought was, "No, that was way, way, way too big to be a shooting star." My next thought was a firework, but I eliminated that as there was absolutely no sound in that very quiet neighborhood. My next thought was perhaps I should report it to the police. My last thought was perhaps I should report it to Mufon. I immediately entered my car and noted the time--one minute after midnight.
